Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Illuminati , Scientist
Real Name: Reed Richards
Special Powers
FIND A WAY TO SAVE MY FAMILY: When a friendly character with the Fantastic Four keyword would be KO'd, roll a d6. 5-6: Turn the character to his last non-KO click.
MARVEL'S FIRST FAMILY: UNIQUE MODIFIER - When a Mr. Fantastic heals from the Fantastic Four Team Ability, after resolutions remove an action token and modify Mr. Fantastic's combat values by +1 until the end of your next turn.
"STRETCH": POWER: Giant Reach: 10 and make a close attack.
TACTICAL GENIUS: Leadership. Outwit, but may use it twice if an opposing character is adjacent to a friendly character with the Fantastic Four keyword.

February 23, 2021
spider_ham
The upgrade to "Save My Family" and "Stretch" are powerful, and even at 130 points Reed is a worthwhile investment amongst more modern peers. If you feel that H.E.R.B.I.E.'s abiity to revive Sidekicks is too cheesy, Reed 2.0 is the way.
